title: Flexible Instructional Design Process for Social Network Integration in Classrooms

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Applies flexible instructional design in digital environments for small learner groups, developing classroom social network integration competencies through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and select two or more social network tools appropriate for classroom contexts
Learners can design multi-phase collaborative strategies using social networks in mathematical problem-solving processes
Learners can measure and present the effectiveness of social network-integrated classes through five indicators via project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
